title: Alien Resurrection (Sony PlayStation 1, 2000)

value: Navigate Ellen Ripley and her team through the close quartered Auriga in an effort to destroy the alien queen
Blast on the enemy with pulse rifles, flamethrowers, electric guns, and grenade launchers
Defend your party as the aliens attack you from the ground, the ceiling, and from the wall

short_description: Alien Resurrection brings us the final events of the movie series in the first-person shooter format that Alien Trilogy brought us. This game is set throughout the ship Auriga and there are a variety of aliens in their various forms of gestation to battle, as well as military personnel who've been ordered to silence Ripley permanently.
customer_reviews: Scary game. do not play at night seriously
Replacement cases were exactly what I needed!
Still one of the best 1st. per. shtrs. in PlayStation..
